Object# AgeRatingDeclarationWithoutIncludesResponse

App Store Connect API 3.0+

```
object AgeRatingDeclarationWithoutIncludesResponse
```

## [Properties](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/AgeRatingDeclarationWithoutIncludesResponse#properties)

`data``[AgeRatingDeclaration`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/ageratingdeclaration) (Required) 

`links``[DocumentLinks`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/documentlinks) (Required) 

## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/AgeRatingDeclarationWithoutIncludesResponse#see-also)

### [Objects and data types](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/AgeRatingDeclarationWithoutIncludesResponse#Objects-and-data-types)

[`object AgeRatingDeclaration`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/ageratingdeclaration)The data structure that represents an Age Rating Declarations resource.[`object AgeRatingDeclarationResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/ageratingdeclarationresponse)A response that contains a single Age Rating Declarations resource.[`object AgeRatingDeclarationUpdateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/ageratingdeclarationupdaterequest)The request body you use to update an Age Rating Declaration.[`object AppInfoAgeRatingDeclarationLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appinfoageratingdeclarationlinkageresponse)[`object AppInfoTerritoryAgeRatingsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appinfoterritoryageratingslinkagesresponse)[`type AppStoreAgeRating`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreagerating)String that represents the app’s age rating as it appears on the App Store for all platforms.[`type BrazilAgeRating`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/brazilagerating)String that represents the app’s age rating as it appears on the App Store in Brazil for all platforms.[`type KidsAgeBand`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/kidsageband)String that represents a Made for Kids app’s age band.[`object TerritoryAgeRating`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/territoryagerating)The data structure that represent a territory age-rating resource.[`object TerritoryAgeRatingsResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/territoryageratingsresponse)A response that contains a list of territory age-rating resources.
